poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: 2/3 of what you need or want Is owned by nine gazillionaires. Their names: Sugar-cane, Sugar-beet, Soybean and Palm-oil fruit, Maize and Cassava, Rice, Wheat and Potato. Soon there will be seven, each Controlling one of the seven remaining Specimens of drone. And all of them competing for your shite.
